entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
